title: QC Per-Sequence Quality Statistics
description: Per-sequence read-quality statistics calculated by FASTQC for subset samples, concatenated across samples within a group by the DOWNSTREAM workflow. Each row represents the count of reads with a given mean Phred score for one read pair file.

fields.name: mean_phred_score
fields.title: Mean Phred Score
fields.description: Mean Phred quality score for the sequence.

fields.name: n_sequences
fields.title: Number of Sequences
fields.description: Number of reads with this mean Phred score.

fields.name: file
fields.title: File
fields.description: Read pair identifier (e.g. R1 or R2 filename).

fields.name: sample
fields.title: Sample
fields.description: Sample identifier from the RUN workflow.

fields.name: group
fields.title: Group
fields.description: Group identifier assigned to this sample in the grouping TSV.
